sentences.en: A hammer can be a lethal weapon.
sentences.cn: 铁锤可以是致命的武器.

sentences.en: a lethal cocktail of drink and pills
sentences.cn: 一种酒和药的致命混合物

sentences.en: a lethal dose of heroin
sentences.cn: 致命剂量的海洛因

sentences.en: a lethal dose of poison
sentences.cn: 毒药的致死剂量

sentences.en: a lethal weapon
sentences.cn: 致命的武器

sentences.en: All these knives are absolutely lethal.
sentences.cn: 这些刀都是绝对致命的.

sentences.en: But chemical agents, lethal viruses and shadowy terrorist networks are not easily contained.
sentences.cn: 但是化学制剂和致命病毒以及隐蔽的恐怖主义网不是那么容易就能被控制的.

sentences.en: death by lethal injection
sentences.cn: 注入致命剂量造成的死亡

sentences.en: Execution by lethal injection is scheduled for July 30th.
sentences.cn: 定于7月30日执行注射死刑。

sentences.en: Frost and wet are the lethal combination for plants.
sentences.cn: 霜雨天气对植物危害极大。

sentences.en: He was executed by lethal injection earlier today.
sentences.cn: 他于今天早些时候被注射处死。

sentences.en: High-powered cars are lethal weapons in the hands of inexperienced drivers.
sentences.cn: 马力大的汽车到了缺乏经验的司机手中便成了毁灭性的武器。

sentences.en: Higher taxes and higher inflation were a lethal combination.
sentences.cn: 重税加上高通货膨胀真是让人没法活了。

sentences.en: It was a potentially lethal mixture of drugs.
sentences.cn: 这种混合药物有很大的潜在危险.

sentences.en: Neutronbombs are meant to kill tank crews by lethal irradition.
sentences.cn: 制造中子弹的目的是为了用致命的辐射来杀死坦克操作手们.

sentences.en: Sarvas discusses the nature of the " lethal load " in conifers.
sentences.cn: 萨维斯 讨论了针叶树的致死的基因性质.

sentences.en: Someone had fed him a lethal dose of cyanide.
sentences.cn: 有人给他下了致命剂量的氰化物。

sentences.en: The barriers are lethal to fish trying to swim upstream.
sentences.cn: 这些障碍物对于想要往上游游动的鱼儿来说是致命的。

sentences.en: The most lethal complication is fulminating colitis.
sentences.cn: 最严重的致死性并发症是暴发性结肠炎.

sentences.en: They were all drinking lethal amounts of tequila!
sentences.cn: 他们都在不要命地喝特奎拉酒！

sentences.en: They were close to weaponizing ricin—a lethal plant toxin.
sentences.cn: 他们快把蓖麻毒素——一种致命的植物毒素——研发为武器了。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 致命性注射剂；注射处死

trans.tran_cn: 致命的，致死的，能致命的，破坏性的，有害的
trans.tran_en: causing death, or able to cause death
